channel.title: Homes on Vincent Florquin
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Vincent Florquin

item.description: Vincent Florquin A short description of myself here (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

About Me BRUH I am a second year student in biology, and i study at the university of Mons, Belgium. I am 19 years old and i have been interested in biology since childhood. Before the beginning of my second year, i wasn't sure what i should do as a professionnal, and even if im still not really sure, i have been interested in toxicology and parasites subjects that we saw in Histology, physiology and bio animal.
